The measures of the interior angles of a convex polygon of $n$ sides are in arithmetic progression.  If the common difference is $5^\circ$ and the largest angle is $160^\circ$, then $n$ equals:\\
\\
$\textbf{(A)}\   9\qquad
\textbf{(B)}\   10\qquad
\textbf{(C)}\   12\qquad
\textbf{(D)}\   16\qquad
\textbf{(E)}\  32 $
